thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Overpriced hotel
thread.title_full: Overpriced hotel - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: xxCSxx
title: Overpriced hotel
text:
This hotel was in a great location, however it was the only good thing about the hotel
We came back to the room one day and our balcony door was left open, we were on the ground floor so easily accessible for anyone to get in. I complained to reception and told that no manager was available and that as nothing was stolen it was a simple error. Our passport and money was in the room
Was very noisy cleaner hoovering outside door at 8am on Saturday morning and constant noise of lift going up and down
Not once did any staff member saying Hi or were we ok. Checked us in and said room was at the bottom on the left.
Poor service and the room was not that of a 4star. Will not return to this hotel again
